verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: greeted] [ARG1: German Chancellor Angela Merkel] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARGM-PRP: for an Oval Office meeting , a working lunch and a joint news conference] .
President Donald Trump greeted German Chancellor Angela Merkel at the White House Friday for an Oval Office meeting , a [V: working] [ARG0: lunch] and a joint news conference .
